page.title: 17SHOPPING IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: Asda is the most popular{shop}in Rossendale.It is a{hyper market.}Kwik Save is a {super market}and is quite cheap.It is on Bacup Rd.to the right of the bus station.Boots,Woolworths and the Co-op are other popular{shops in Rawtenstall and Waterfoot.Boots and Woolworths are both situated in Rawtenstall but Co-op is in Waterfoot. It is half day closing on Tuesday. The{market}opens on Thursdays and Saturdays.Only Rawtenstall has a precinct with other popular shops in. At Asda 53% of the shoppers come from outside Rawtenstall.Most of those came from Ramsbottom.80% of their shopping was groceries.55% of people shopped weekly,and 30% shopped monthly.
